abstract: An online game called Spent lets you see what it's like to live on $1,000 a month.
snippet: An online game called Spent lets you see what it's like to live on $1,000 a month.
lead_paragraph: Could you live on $1,000 a month? An online game called Spent lets you see what it's like to make the tough choices necessary to get by on that amount of income.

headline.main: Online Game Challenges You to Live On $1,000 A Month
